In the months leading up to the field trip, music teachers prepared students to sing, clap, and even dance with the orchestra. Elementary art teachers guided the students to use their imagination to create their own work of art inspired by the story and music of the magical story ‚ÄúThe Sorcerer‚Äôs Apprentice‚Äù. During this journey, they began to realize how much the sounds of the symphony orchestra formed a key part of how they experienced music and art.

Several 5th grade and high school student musicians were selected to participate with the symphony as well.
